title: When I go to support and click login it opens a link that says login failed without letting me try
body:
When I click login it automatically goes to this screen without letting me put in any information.  What is happening here?

To log in, you must have a League of Legends account with a verified email address. We sent you an email with a link to verify your address. If you don't receive the email in the next few minutes, check out our FAQ

Forgot Password?
Can't Login to support?
Back to Support
Verify your Email!
Forgot Username?

replies.body: Do you have any extensions?  That could cause an issue like this, but trying clearing your [cache and cookies](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies) cookies as well incase something is preventing you from getting in.  If all else fails, you can also reach out to us via email at support@riotgames.com!
